metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35506 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in the am53c974 SCSI host busadapter emulation of QEMU in versions before 6.0.0 during the handling ofthe 'Information Transfer' command (CMD_TI). This flaw allows a privilegedguest user to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial ofservice or potential code execution with the privileges of the QEMUprocess.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
